metadata.title: CVE-2021-30540 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in payments in Google Chrome on Android prior to91.0.4472.77 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
